this is very weird
i think, it'd mean that there were compile errors, but the build was clean

I imported plugins on top of projects that were already there (e.g., started 
with an existing workspace).  Turned off auto build beforehand.

Lynne,
you took the nightly build by mistake.
(this compile error was there)
